# Actions SDK - Plugin SDK

Javascript SDK for developing plugins for the Logi Plugin Service

## Setup

### Install Volta

Volta is a Nodejs version manager tool. This project specifies which version of Nodejs to use for development in the package.json config.

Install Volta [here](https://docs.volta.sh/guide/getting-started)

Volta will automatically switch to the correct node version when running Nodejs inside of this repository

### Install Recommended VS Code Extensions

This project recommends a set of VS Code extensions listed in `.vscode/extensions.json`.
When you open the project in VS Code, you should be prompted to install them automatically.

### Install Project Dependencies

`npm install`
